comments.WARNING_1: DO NOT STORE SECRETS IN THIS FILE!
comments.WARNING_2: Please use lower camel case notation for all settings in the appSettings
comments.ImplementationDetails_1: This is the base json file that can be overridden by properties in settings.<ENV>.json
comments.ImplementationDetails_2: See @js/dataModels/settings/appSettings.ts to perform a proper Typescript mapping of properties added here
comments.ImplementationDetails_3: This file can be changed on-the-fly and new changes will be read on browser refresh
